bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, FACT IS construction, women's tubesets, women's performance geometry, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, OSBB

1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 20mm cone spacer and 20mm of spacers
New CompSet 6061 alloy, cone head bolt, 12-degree, 4-degree shim 31.8mm
Specialized Women's Comp, alloy, shallow drop
Shimano Ultegra STI, flight deck compatible, 10-speed
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Turbo Elite w/BlackBelt, 100 TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
Specialized Turbo Elite w/BlackBelt, 100 TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
Body Geometry Jett Gel w/ hollow Cr-Mo rails
